description: I. Impact assessment of a GB-wide smart meter roll out for the domestic sector. 62 p. II. Smart meter roll-out: energy network business market model definition & evaluation project. Incl. appendices. 58 p. III. Towards a smarter future: Government response to the consultation on electricity and gas smart metering. Incl. annex. 56 p. IV. Impact Assessment of smart / advanced meters roll out to small and medium businesses. 31 p.
department: Dept of Energy and Climate Change
